title: ASL 8.7 ‚Äî Project Updates (Demo ‚Ä¢ Feedback ‚Ä¢ Next Steps) üîÅ
objectives: Give a concise project demo with time-first framing and clear section signposts
Solicit and deliver feedback with RS + neutral returns and short, actionable phrasing

vocab.def: Brief walk-through of the current state.
Problem that needs help or a decision.
Mark a done item or closed loop.

sections.heading: Warm-Up: Signpost the Update
sections.body: Drill frame: **TODAY DEMO. THEN FEEDBACK. FINALLY NEXT-STEP.** Use **micro-pauses** and small head shifts between phases.

sections.heading: Model: 30‚Äì45s Update Loop

media.alt: Presenter demoing, receiving notes, confirming plan

sections.body:
Example gloss:
‚Ä¢ **TODAY DEMO FLYER V2.** **HOME PAGE FINISH. COLOR CHANGE BLUE.**
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíREVIEWER:** **FEEDBACK WHAT TWO?** (neutral)
‚Ä¢ **RS‚ÜíREVIEWER:** **ONE TEXT BIGGER. TWO IMAGE CONTRAST MORE.** (neutral)
‚Ä¢ **PRESENTER:** **OK CHANGE TEXT BIGGER, IMAGE CONTRAST. DUE WEDNESDAY NIGHT.**

sections.heading: Technique: Actionable Feedback
sections.body: Keep notes concrete with numbers: **ONE‚Ä¶ TWO‚Ä¶** Use verbs **CHANGE/FIX/ADD** + short noun: **CHANGE TEXT SIZE**, **FIX ALIGN**, **ADD ALT-TEXT**. Avoid long explanations.

callouts.title: One Decision at a Time
callouts.body: If a blocker appears, name it, decide, then move on.

sections.heading: Partner Drill: Demo + Two Notes + Plan
sections.body: A demos current work (10‚Äì12s). B gives **two numbered notes**. A sets **one next step with DUE** and requests a **repeat-back**. Swap roles.

sections.heading: Mini-Showcase
sections.body: Record **25‚Äì35s**: **DEMO (2 details)** ‚Üí **FEEDBACK (two numbered notes)** ‚Üí **NEXT-STEP with DUE** ‚Üí **repeat-back**. Optional: mark one item **FINISH**.
sections.teacherNote: Caption your two feedback notes and the agreed due date.
